DOC.detailed_description: Background : Pre-eclampsia , proteinuric gestational hypertension alone , state exaggerate systemic inflammation remain lead direct cause maternal morbidity mortality worldwide.1 Standardization antenatal postnatal assessment surveillance pre-eclampsia protocol recognize systemic inflammatory model preeclampsia associate reduce maternal morbidity.2 To quantitatively asses electroencephalography ( EEG ) mental involvement Pre-eclampsia still time consume always readily available . PIERS develop internally validate pre-eclampsia outcome prediction modelâ€” ( Preeclampsia Integrated Estimate RiSk ) model.3 The purpose study evaluate discriminative power Bispectral Index ( BIS ) , biomarkers sFIT ( soluble FMS-like Tyrosine Kinase ) : PIGF ( Placental Growth Factor ) ratio,4 adrenomedullin mortality risk stratifier,5 classify degree progression pre-eclampsia . Methods : In 24 patient Eclampsia pre-eclampsia investigator use artefact-free 20-min mean BIS value , well biomarkers sFIT ( soluble FMS-like Tyrosine Kinase ) : PIGF ( Placental Growth Factor ) ratio adrenomedullin mortality risk stratifier classify degree pre-eclampsia correlate PIERS Pre-eclampsia risk assessment PIERS percentage ( http : //piers.cfri.ca/PIERSCalculatorH.aspx ) calculate patient ' clinical laboratory finding document chart , compare 24 pregnant patient without Eclampsia pre-eclampsia .
